DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Infused enemies take damage whenever their HP is lower than their Infused stacks.
The ammo of the Ranger's bow. NL #yEssence is required to get the full potential of some cards.

Triggers if your #yCamouflage is bigger than the attack of the target's intent.
Ignores target's #yBlock. It's not affected by player's debuffs.
